summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: SIMPEXPE Spray Bottles Fine Mister, Refillable Cosmetic Containers for Cleaning 6.8 oz Review Date: 2021/01/23 Store: SIMPEXPE Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SIMPEXPE', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '200 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.3 x 2.4 x 2.2 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '7.3 x 2.4 x 2.2 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '761344588684'} Review Text: Package includes: 2 spray bottles
This 7oz spray bottle has an adjustable nozzle and translucent bottle to easily see liquid levels. It can be used for a variety of home and garden application. Review Title: Looks neat but small Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyeshadow Makeup Palette Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Pallet High Pigmented Long Lasting Professional Metallic Eye Shadows Waterproof Make-Up 35 Colors (01) Review Date: 2021/01/28 Store: SACE LADY Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SACE LADY', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '7.95 x 4.09 x 0.47 inches; 0.04 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AMZ-SL326'} Review Text: I love the colors! and the pigment is amazing. it is super smooth and blends really well! I was happy to see it didn't break in shipping and was packaged well. I actually really like the pallet case its simple. Review Title: Nice pallets! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Keratin Secrets Do It Yourself Home Keratin System Review Date: 2021/05/17 Store: Keratin Secrets Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 4.21 x 3.9 inches; 2.87 Pounds'} Review Text: Keratin’s make the hair smoother (NOT STRAIGHT), shinier, and frizzy free for up to 8 months depending on the strength of the product. Keratin treatments rebound the keratin in your hair so that they are all put back into place. There are a lot of steps but don’t get discouraged because they’re quiet simple. To start of give 2 good shampoos with a clarifying shampoo (specifically the keratin complex one, then towel dry and blow dry the unconditioned hair. Once fully dry, make small sections and apply the treatment from roots to ends and comb through with a fine tooth comb to make sure hair is fully saturated. Let that sit for 30 minutes then blow dry again without washing out the product. Once fully dry the final step will be to straighten the hair with a flatiron so the keratin will set in your hair. After you’re completely done you won’t be able to wash your hair for up to 3 days depending on the strength in the solution. Review Title: Smooth long curls Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner. Review Date: 2021/09/09 Store: Alyxxndra Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'Alyxxndra', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Disposable', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Package Dimensions': '9.21 x 6.1 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '788402874992', 'Manufacturer': 'Alyxxndra'} Review Text: I like this pen I wish it worked a little better though. I have the liquid one as well and I feel that that one holds the mascara a little more but it is stickier so I really wanted the pen to work especially for the wing. But overall, I love the liner and the lashes so much easier than trying to mess with glue. Thank you for your products they arRead more about the review stating Liner and lashes a total game-changer. Review Title: Love it Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: IPL Hair Removal | Laser Hair Removal For Women - Upgraded 999,999 Flashes with 2 Flash Windows, Permanent Hair Removal For Legs, Arms, Underarm, Face,Bikini Line,Chest. (white& golden) Gift (white) Review Date: 2021/10/16 Store: MELUN Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MELUN', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Charger', 'Head Type': 'Foil', 'Number of Blades': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 7.5 x 3.1 inches; 1.45 Pounds', 'UPC': '653846877987'} Review Text: It arrived as described with two shielding glasses and a razor. The product itself is easy to use and the buttons on it are easy to figure out and operate. I got this product a few weeks ago so it's still too early to tell about its efficacy (which is why I gave it 4 stars but will update a few months from now when results can be actually measured). There are a few things I've already noticed however, on the sections where I've been using it the hair seems to be growing a bit thinner and taking also a bit longer to grow back. I'm comparing results by leaving a patch next to the area I'm treating alone and seeing how fast they both grow, the treated area seems to be lagging behind by a couple of days. We'll see what happens in a few months after which I will update. Review Title: Works well - have to be consistent. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Removal for Women and Men - IPL Permanent Hair Remover Technology - 999,999 Flashes Automatic Hair Remover for Face, Arms, Legs, Bikini Area and Whole Body Review Date: 2021/10/16 Store: UNIWA Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '7.8 x 2.5 x 1.57 inches; 1.32 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'cwell'} Review Text: I’ve been using this for a little over three months. I use it maybe every two to three days on my face, underarms and bikini area. The hair on my bikini area grows in slower so I figured in a few more months it should be nonexistent. Underarm hair still grows in the same amount and texture. It might require longer use. I had stray hairs on my jawline that would cause ingrown hairs and then hyperpigmentation from the scar. The main ones are gone!! The thicker ones I should say. Definitely have noticed a difference on my face. It’s worth a shot- it’s cheaper than going to a salon and it’s a quick process to treat the areas. Just don’t use the razor that comes in the box. It’s very rough and won’t remove the hair. Review Title: After 3 months of use can slightly see results Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/10/18 Store: Shakira Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Shakira', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Dance', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2.64 x 2.05 x 5.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8411061823033'} Review Text: I love the bottle and the scent lasts all day. It is a sweet smell, but not floral. It has a clean smell and is very Feminine. The price is good. I like the scent, but it's not the exact scent I desire. Every time I fall in love with a new perfume. Review Title: Long lasting fragrance Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 21pcs with storage box for girls big bow hairpin ribbon full cover flower hairpin baby toddler hair accessories Review Date: 2022/01/31 Store: Havtyyise Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Havtyyise', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Babies', 'Material': 'Linen', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '3.55 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 0.53 Ounces'} Review Text: The bows are really pretty. The material they are made from is very substantial. I would have liked some bows of the same color because I sometimes put 2 ponytails in our little girls' hair and I would have liked matching bows on each ponytail. Review Title: Pretty little bows Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual displays a preference for cosmetic and beauty products, particularly those that offer practicality and versatility for personal grooming and aesthetics. They exhibit a favorable sentiment towards products that are visually appealing, as evidenced by their enjoyment of vibrant colors and attractive packaging. The majority of their purchases feature an average rating above 3.5, indicating a tendency to appreciate quality, although ratings show variability that suggests moderate satisfaction.

Common themes reinforce a focus on home and personal care, specifically items for makeup, hair treatment, and grooming. They show an interest in products that are easy to use and offer long-lasting results, enhancing their grooming regimen without extensive effort.

Quality is a recurring preference; they value materials that are durable and reliable, reflecting a desire for functionality. Their positive reception of well-packaged items suggests that presentation plays a role in their purchasing decisions.

Price sensitivity appears moderate, with repeated selections of products offering good value, suggesting they seek a balance between cost and quality.

In essence, this person favors aesthetically pleasing, practical beauty solutions across various categories, appreciates durability and effectiveness, and demonstrates a willingness to invest in reliable products while being mindful of cost.

target_interaction.title: Glue marks are visible
target_interaction.text:
[[VIDEOID:cacda40d4b468ea5cec922612fb17d52]] The package that I have received:

1 PC Set fake nails kit set
1 PC Mini nail file
1 PC Wood stick
1 PC Sheet double-sided stickers

Lockdown has tested me. I got these and they are really lovely. Really lighten your nails and look gorgeous. I personally wouldn't buy fake nails again as you can see parts of the glue under the nail but I am ultra fussy. Am going to buy a range of colors to see me through this pandemic. Great but, really pleased.
target_interaction.title_meta: UPHUNAL Handmade False Nails Set Long Press on Nails 24Pcs Coffin Fake Nails for Any Occasions Reusable Acrylic Matte Artificial Nails with Nail File Best for Mums or Ladies’ Gifts(Black Snow)
